name: Munster (CoreCompetency)
description:
Munster is a minimalist, hard platform / puzzle game.

In Munster it's all about your choices, fortunately there is also time to regret.

  • Press down space or left mouse button to jump when on a circle.
  • If your tail has not left the ground you can go back by pressing space or the left mouse button again.

Looking for input on the level, in terms of difficulty, and over-all if it was any fun to be had in the challenge.

Thanks for playing!

Music:

- Rameses B. - Spaceship
